<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">APPENDIX A</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CONSULTING AGREEMENT</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CONSULTING AGREEMENT </font></b>dated
this &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="1" style="font-size:7.0pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">th</font>&#160;day of
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
20&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; by and between Guess?,&nbsp;Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) and
Carlos Alberini (&#147;Alberini&#148;).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WITNESSETH:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, Alberini
has served as the Company&#146;s President and Chief Operating Officer;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, Alberini
will no longer serve as the Company&#146;s President and Chief Operating Officer
(the effective date of such termination of service is referred to as the &#147;Termination
Date&#148;) but has agreed to provide consulting services to the Company as the
Board of Directors of the Company (the &#147;Board&#148;) may reasonably consider
appropriate; and</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">WHEREAS</font></b>, the parties
desire to set forth their respective rights and obligations regarding Alberini&#146;s
consulting arrangement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NOW, THEREFORE</font></b>, in
consideration of the covenants set forth herein and for other good and valuable
consideration, the receipt and adequacy of which are hereby acknowledged, the
parties, intending to be legally bound, agree as follows:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Consulting Period</u>.&#160; The Company agrees to retain Alberini as a
consultant to provide the services described in Section&nbsp;2 below from the
Termination Date until the first anniversary of the Termination Date (the &#147;Consulting
Period&#148;), as provided in this Consulting Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Consulting
Services</u>.&#160; Alberini shall provide
such consulting services to the Company as reasonably requested by the Board
from time to time; provided that Alberini and the Company agree that in no
event will the Company require, nor will Alberini perform, a level of services
during the Consulting Period that would result in Alberini not having had a &#147;separation
from service&#148; (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;409A of the Internal Revenue
Code of 1986, as amended (&#147;Section&nbsp;409A&#148;)) from the Company and its
subsidiaries as of the date his employment by the Company terminated.&#160; These services may include but are not
limited to performing any transition and integration services related to the Company&#146;s
business and cooperating with the Company regarding any litigation initiated
involving matters of which Alberini has particular knowledge.&#160; Alberini agrees to be available up to seven
days per month during the Consulting Period to perform the Consulting
Services.&#160; The Consulting Services will
be performed at such times as are reasonably requested by the Company after
reasonable consultation with Alberini.&#160;
Alberini shall provide these services in Los Angeles, California,
provided that Alberini shall be required to travel for business and client
meetings as reasonably requested by the Company.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=17,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="6",CHK=811316,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KQ-03_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:03 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Fees</u>.&#160; As compensation for the Consulting Services,
the Company shall pay Alberini fifty percent of Alberini&#146;s Base Salary as of
the Termination Date per annum during the Consulting Period.&#160; Fees shall be paid monthly in arrears by the
15th day of the following month.&#160;
Alberini shall not be entitled to participate, and shall not participate
in any employee benefit plan providing benefits to Company employees, whether
presently in force or adopted subsequent to this Consulting Agreement, with
respect to his Consulting Services.&#160;
Notwithstanding the foregoing, Alberini shall retain all compensation
and benefits that continue past his Termination Date pursuant to the terms of
his Amended and Restated Employment Agreement with the Company dated December&nbsp;18,
2008 or otherwise.&#160; All reasonable and
necessary business expenses incurred by Alberini in the performance of the
Consulting Services shall be promptly reimbursed by the Company in accordance with
the Company&#146;s standard expense reimbursement policies applicable to independent
contractors.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Status</u>.&#160; Alberini acknowledges and agrees that his
status at all times during the Consulting Period shall be that of an
independent contractor.&#160; Alberini hereby
waives any rights to be treated as an employee or deemed employee of the
Company or any of its affiliates for any purpose following his termination of
employment at the Termination Date except as provided under his Employment
Agreement.&#160; The parties hereby
acknowledge and agree that the compensation provided for in Section&nbsp;3
shall represent fees for Consulting Services provided by Alberini as an
independent contractor, and shall be paid without any deductions or
withholdings for taxes.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Retained Property</u>.&#160; During the Consulting Period, Alberini shall
retain all property of the Company in his possession, including, but not
limited to, credit cards, security key cards, telephone cards, car service
cards, computer software or hardware, Company identification cards, Company
records and copies of records, correspondence and copies of correspondence and
other books or manuals issued by the Company.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Assignability</u>.&#160; Alberini may not assign or transfer this
Consulting Agreement or any of Alberini&#146;s rights, duties or obligations
hereunder.&#160; The Company may assign this
Consulting Agreement to any person or entity acquiring all or substantially all
of the assets (by merger or otherwise) of the Company so long as such person,
entity or affiliate assumes the Company&#146;s obligations hereunder.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Entire Agreement</u>.&#160; This Consulting Agreement constitutes the
full and complete understanding and agreement of the parties hereto with
respect to engaging Alberini as a consultant to the Company.&#160; This Consulting Agreement may not be changed
or amended orally, but only by an agreement in writing signed by the party
against whom enforcement of any waiver, change, modification or discharge is
sought.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Divisibility</u>.&#160; If any one or more of the provisions of this
Consulting Agreement or any application thereof shall be invalid, illegal or
unenforceable in any respect, the validity, legality or enforceability of the
remaining provisions and other application thereof shall not in any way be
affected or impaired.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Applicable Law</u>.&#160; This Consulting Agreement shall be governed
by, and the rights and obligations of the parties determined in accordance
with, the laws of the State of California as in effect for contracts made and
to be performed in the State of California.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=18,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="6",CHK=868484,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KQ-03_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:03 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Survival</u>.&#160; All of the Company&#146;s obligations hereunder
shall survive the termination of this Consulting Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Counterparts</u>.&#160; This Consulting Agreement may be executed in
counterparts, each of which shall be deemed an original, all of which shall together
constitute one and the same Consulting Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Section&nbsp;409A</u>.&#160; It is intended that any amounts payable under
this Agreement and the Company&#146;s and Alberini&#146;s exercise of authority or
discretion hereunder shall comply with and avoid the imputation of any tax,
penalty or interest under Section&nbsp;409A.&#160;
This Agreement shall be construed and interpreted consistent with that
intent.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF</font></b>,
the undersigned have duly executed this Consulting Agreement as of the day and
year first above written.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.18%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.5</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company Restoration Matching Amount</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.18%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.18%;">

  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.6%;">

 </tr>
 <tr>

  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.18%;">

  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.6%;">

  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.18%;">

  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Change in Control Benefit</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.18%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.6%;">

  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">

 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.18%;">

  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Payment of Change in Control Benefit</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.18%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.18%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE 6</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.6%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">RETIREMENT BENEFIT</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">16</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.18%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>

  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">

  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">BENEFICIARY DESIGNATION</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">18</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">

  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">

 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">

  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">

  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">

  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Presentation of Claim</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">22</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.2</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notification of Decision</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">22</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">

  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">

  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Review of a Denied Claim</font></p>

  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">23</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">

 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">

  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Decision on Review</font></p>

  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">

 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">

  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">

  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">

 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">

 <tr>

  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">TRUST</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">24</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">

  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">

  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">

  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Establishment of the Trust</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">24</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">

  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">

  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">

  </td>

  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">

 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">

  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">

 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE 17</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">MISCELLANEOUS</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">24</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.1</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Status of Plan</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">24</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.2</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Unsecured General Creditor</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">24</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.3</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Employer&#146;s Liability</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">25</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:12.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.4</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="76%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:76.76%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Nonassignability</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:11.22%;">
