the compensation of its Participants, the date and circumstances of the
Separation from Service, Disability or death of its Participants, and such
other pertinent information as the Committee (or its delegate) or Administrator
may reasonably require.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE 14</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Other Benefits and Agreements</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Coordination with Other
Benefits</u></b>.&#160; The benefits
provided for a Participant and Participant&#146;s Beneficiary under the Plan are in
addition to any other benefits available to such Participant under any other
plan or program for employees of the Participant&#146;s Employer.&#160; The Plan shall supplement and shall not
supersede, modify or amend any other such plan or program except as may
otherwise be expressly provided.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE 15</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Claims Procedures</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Presentation of Claim</u></b>.&#160; Any Participant or Beneficiary of a deceased
Participant (such Participant or Beneficiary being referred to below as a &#147;Claimant&#148;)
may deliver to the Committee a written claim for a determination with respect
to the amounts distributable to such Claimant from the Plan.&#160; If such a claim relates to the contents of a
notice received by the Claimant, the claim must be made within 60&nbsp;days
after such notice was received by the Claimant.&#160;
All other claims must be made within 180&nbsp;days of the date on which
the event that caused the claim to arise occurred.&#160; The claim must state with particularity the
determination desired by the Claimant.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Notification of Decision</u></b>.&#160; The Committee shall consider a Claimant&#146;s
claim within a reasonable time, but no later than 90 days after receiving the
claim.&#160; If the Committee determines that
special circumstances require an extension of time for processing the claim,
written notice of the extension shall be furnished to the Claimant prior to the
termination of the initial 90 day period.&#160;
In no event shall such extension exceed a period of 90 days from the end
of the initial period.&#160; The extension
notice shall indicate the special circumstances requiring an extension of time
and the date by which the Committee expects to render the benefit
determination.&#160; The Committee shall
notify the Claimant in writing:</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">22</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=27,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="7",CHK=500466,FOLIO='22',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KS-05_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:05 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>that the Claimant&#146;s requested determination
has been made, and that the claim has been allowed in full; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>that the Committee has reached a conclusion
contrary, in whole or in part, to the Claimant&#146;s requested determination, and
such notice must set forth in a manner calculated to be understood by the
Claimant:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the specific reason(s)&nbsp;for the denial
of the claim, or any part of it;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>specific reference(s)&nbsp;to pertinent
provisions of the Plan upon which such denial was based;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a description of any additional material or
information necessary for the Claimant to perfect the claim, and an explanation
of why such material or information is necessary;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>an explanation of the claim review procedure
set forth in Section&nbsp;15.3
below; and</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a statement of the Claimant&#146;s right to bring
a civil action under ERISA Section&nbsp;502(a)&nbsp;following an adverse
benefit determination on review.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Review of a Denied Claim</u></b>.&#160; On or before 60&nbsp;days after receiving a
notice from the Committee that a claim has been denied, in whole or in part, a
Claimant (or the Claimant&#146;s duly authorized representative) may file with the
Committee a written request for a review of the denial of the claim.&#160; The Claimant (or the Claimant&#146;s duly
authorized representative):</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>may, upon request and free of charge, have
reasonable access to, and copies of, all documents, records and other
information relevant (as defined in applicable ERISA regulations) to the claim
for benefits;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>may submit written comments or other
documents; and/or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>may request a hearing, which the Committee,
in its sole discretion, may grant.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Decision on Review</u></b>.&#160; The Committee shall render its decision on
review promptly, and no later than 60&nbsp;days after the Committee receives
the Claimant&#146;s written request for a review of the denial of the claim.&#160; If the Committee determines that special
circumstances require an extension of time for processing the claim, written
notice of the extension shall be furnished to the Claimant prior to the
termination of the initial 60 day period.&#160;
In no event shall such extension exceed a period of 60 days from the end
of the initial period.&#160; The extension
notice shall indicate the special circumstances requiring an extension of time
and the date by which the Committee expects to render the benefit
determination.&#160; In rendering its
decision, the Committee shall take into account all comments, documents,
records and other information submitted by the Claimant relating to the claim,
without regard to whether such information was submitted or considered in the
initial benefit determination.&#160; The
decision must be written in a manner calculated to be understood by the
Claimant, and it must contain:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>specific reasons for the decision;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>specific reference(s)&nbsp;to the pertinent
Plan provisions upon which the decision was based;</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">23</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=28,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="7",CHK=481148,FOLIO='23',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KS-05_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:05 2009' -->



<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a statement that the Claimant is entitled to
receive, upon request and free of charge, reasonable access to and copies of,
all documents, records and other information relevant (as defined in applicable
ERISA regulations) to the Claimant&#146;s claim for benefits; and</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>a statement of the Claimant&#146;s right to bring
a civil action under ERISA Section&nbsp;502(a).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15.5</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Legal Action</u></b>.&#160; A Claimant&#146;s compliance with the foregoing
provisions of this Article&nbsp;15 is a mandatory prerequisite to a Claimant&#146;s
right to commence any legal action with respect to any claim for benefits under
this Plan.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE 16</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Trust</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Establishment of the Trust</u></b>.&#160; In order to provide assets from which to
fulfill the obligations of the Participants and their Beneficiaries under the
Plan, the Company shall establish a trust by a trust agreement with a third
party, the trustee (the &#147;Trust&#148;), and each Employer shall at least annually
transfer over to the Trust such assets as the Employer determines, in its sole
discretion, are necessary to provide, on a present value basis, for its
respective future liabilities created with respect to the Annual Accounts for
such Employer&#146;s Participants (or such Participants&#146; Beneficiaries) for all
periods prior to the transfer, as well as any debits and credits to such
Participants&#146; Annual Accounts for all periods prior to the transfer, taking
into consideration the value of the assets in the Trust at the time of the
transfer.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Interrelationship of the
Plan and the Trust</u></b>.&#160; The
provisions of the Plan and the Plan Agreement shall govern the rights of a
Participant to receive distributions pursuant to the Plan.&#160; The provisions of the Trust shall govern the
rights of the Employers, Participants and the creditors of the Employers to the
assets transferred to the Trust.&#160; Each
Employer shall at all times remain liable to carry out its obligations under
the Plan.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Distributions From the
Trust</u></b>.&#160; Each Employer&#146;s
obligations under the Plan may be satisfied with Trust assets distributed
pursuant to the terms of the Trust, and any such distribution shall reduce the
Employer&#146;s obligations under this Plan.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE 17</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Miscellaneous</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Status of Plan</u></b>.&#160; The Plan is intended to be a plan that is not
qualified within the meaning of Code Section&nbsp;401(a)&nbsp;and that &#147;is unfunded
and is maintained by an employer primarily for the purpose of providing
deferred compensation for a select group of management or highly compensated
employees&#148; within the meaning of ERISA Sections 201(2), 301(a)(3)&nbsp;and
401(a)(1).&#160; The Plan shall be administered
and interpreted (a)&nbsp;to the extent possible in a manner consistent with the
intent described in the preceding sentence, and (b)&nbsp;in accordance with
Code Section&nbsp;409A and related Treasury guidance and Regulations.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Unsecured General Creditor</u></b>.&#160; Participants and their Beneficiaries, heirs,
successors and assigns shall have no legal or equitable rights, interests or
claims in any property or assets of an Employer.&#160; For purposes of the payment of benefits under
this Plan, any and all of an Employer&#146;s assets shall be, and remain, the
general, unpledged unrestricted assets of the Employer.&#160; An Employer&#146;s obligation under the Plan shall
be merely that of an unfunded and unsecured promise to pay money in the future.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">24</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=29,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="7",CHK=525823,FOLIO='24',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KS-07_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:06 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Employer&#146;s Liability</u></b>.&#160; An Employer&#146;s liability for the payment of
benefits shall be defined only by the Plan and the Plan Agreement, as entered
into between the Employer and a Participant.&#160;
An Employer shall have no obligation to a Participant under the Plan
except as expressly provided in the Plan and his or her Plan Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Nonassignability</u></b>.&#160; Neither a Participant nor any other person
shall have any right to commute, sell, assign, transfer, pledge, anticipate,
mortgage or otherwise encumber, transfer, hypothecate, alienate or convey in
advance of actual receipt, the amounts, if any, payable hereunder, or any part
thereof, which are, and all rights to which are expressly declared to be,
unassignable and non-transferable.&#160; No
part of the amounts payable shall, prior to actual payment, be subject to
seizure, attachment, garnishment or sequestration for the payment of any debts,
judgments, alimony or separate maintenance owed by a Participant or any other
person, be transferable by operation of law in the event of a Participant&#146;s or
any other person&#146;s bankruptcy or insolvency or be transferable to a spouse as a
result of a property settlement or otherwise.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.5</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Not a Contract of
Employment</u></b>.&#160; The terms and
conditions of this Plan shall not be deemed to constitute a contract of
employment between any Employer and the Participant.&#160; Such employment is hereby acknowledged to be
an &#147;at will&#148; employment relationship that can be terminated at any time for any
reason, or no reason, with or without cause, and with or without notice, unless
expressly provided in a written employment agreement.&#160; Nothing in this Plan shall be deemed to give
a Participant the right to be retained in the service of any Employer, either
as an Employee or a Director, or to interfere with the right of any Employer to
discipline or discharge the Participant at any time.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.6</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Furnishing Information</u></b>.&#160; A Participant or his or her Beneficiary will
cooperate with the Committee by furnishing any and all information requested by
the Committee and take such other actions as may be requested in order to
facilitate the administration of the Plan and the payments of benefits
hereunder, including but not limited to taking such physical examinations as
the Committee may deem necessary.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.7</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Terms</u></b>.&#160; Whenever any words are used herein in the
masculine, they shall be construed as though they were in the feminine in all
cases where they would so apply; and whenever any words are used herein in the
singular or in the plural, they shall be construed as though they were used in
the plural or the singular, as the case may be, in all cases where they would
so apply.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.8</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Captions</u></b>.&#160; The captions of the articles, sections and
paragraphs of this Plan are for convenience only and shall not control or
affect the meaning or construction of any of its provisions.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.9</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Governing Law</u></b>.&#160; Subject to ERISA, the provisions of this Plan
shall be construed and interpreted according to the internal laws of the State
of Delaware without regard to its conflicts of laws principles.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.10</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Notice</u></b>.&#160; Any notice or filing required or permitted to
be given to the Committee under this Plan shall be sufficient if in writing and
hand-delivered, or sent by registered or certified mail, to the address below:</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">25</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=30,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="7",CHK=450639,FOLIO='25',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KS-07_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:06 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.8in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Guess?,&nbsp;Inc.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.8in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Attn: Director of Human Resources</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.8in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1444 South Alameda Street</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.8in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Los Angeles, CA 90021</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Such notice shall be deemed given as of the date of delivery or, if
delivery is made by mail, as of the date shown on the postmark on the receipt
for registration or certification.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Any notice or filing required or permitted to be given to a Participant
under this Plan shall be sufficient if in writing and hand-delivered, or sent
by mail, to the last known address of the Participant.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.11</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Successors</u></b>.&#160; The provisions of this Plan shall bind and
inure to the benefit of the Participant&#146;s Employer and its successors and
assigns and the Participant and the Participant&#146;s designated Beneficiaries.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.12</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Spouse&#146;s Interest</u></b>.&#160; The interest in the benefits hereunder of a
spouse of a Participant who has predeceased the Participant shall automatically
pass to the Participant and shall not be transferable by such spouse in any
manner, including but not limited to such spouse&#146;s will, nor shall such
interest pass under the laws of intestate succession.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.13</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Validity</u></b>.&#160; In case any provision of this Plan shall be
illegal or invalid for any reason, said illegality or invalidity shall not
affect the remaining parts hereof, but this Plan shall be construed and
enforced as if such illegal or invalid provision had never been inserted
herein.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.14</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Incompetent</u></b>.&#160; If the Committee determines in its discretion
that a benefit under this Plan is to be paid to a minor, a person declared
incompetent or to a person incapable of handling the disposition of that person&#146;s
property, the Committee may direct payment of such benefit to the guardian,
legal representative or person having the care and custody of such minor,
incompetent or incapable person.&#160; The
Committee may require proof of minority, incompetence, incapacity or
guardianship, as it may deem appropriate prior to distribution of the
benefit.&#160; Any payment of a benefit shall
be a payment for the account of the Participant and the Participant&#146;s Beneficiary,
as the case may be, and shall be a complete discharge of any liability under
the Plan for such payment amount.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.15</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Domestic Relations Orders</u></b>.&#160; If necessary to comply with a domestic
relations order, as defined in Code Section&nbsp;414(p)(1)(B), pursuant to
which a court has determined that a spouse or former spouse of a Participant
has an interest in the Participant&#146;s benefits under the Plan, the Committee
shall have the right to immediately distribute the spouse&#146;s or former spouse&#146;s
interest in the Participant&#146;s benefits under the Plan to such spouse or former
spouse.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.16</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Insurance</u></b>.&#160; The Employers, on their own behalf or on
behalf of the trustee of the Trust, and, in their sole discretion, may apply
for and procure insurance on the life of the Participant, in such amounts and
in such forms as the Employers or the trustee of the Trust may choose.&#160; The Employers or the trustee of the Trust, as
the case may be, shall be the sole owner and beneficiary of any such
insurance.&#160; The Participant shall have no
interest whatsoever in any such policy or policies, and at the request of the
Employers shall submit to medical examinations and supply such information and
execute such documents as may be required by the insurance company or companies
to whom the Employers have applied for insurance.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">26</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=31,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="7",CHK=154861,FOLIO='26',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KS-07_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:06 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.17</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Legal Fees To Enforce
Rights After Change in Control</u></b>.&#160;
The Company and each Employer is aware that upon the occurrence of a
Change in Control, the Board or the board of directors of a Participant&#146;s
Employer (which might then be composed of new members) or a shareholder of the
Company or the Participant&#146;s Employer, or of any successor corporation might
then cause or attempt to cause the Company, the Participant&#146;s Employer or such
successor to refuse to comply with its obligations under the Plan and might
cause or attempt to cause the Company or the Participant&#146;s Employer to
institute, or may institute, litigation seeking to deny Participants the
benefits intended under the Plan.&#160; In
these circumstances, the purpose of the Plan could be frustrated.&#160; Accordingly, if, following a Change in
Control, (i)&nbsp;a Participant or Beneficiary institutes any litigation or
other legal action which seeks to recover benefits under the Plan or which
otherwise asserts that the Committee, the Company, the Employer or any
successor entity to the Company or the Employer has failed to comply with any
of its obligations under this Plan or any agreement thereunder with respect to
such Participant or Beneficiary, or if the Committee, the Company, the Employer
or any other person takes any action to declare this Plan void or unenforceable
or institutes any litigation or other legal action designed to deny, diminish
or to recover from any Participant or Beneficiary the benefits intended to be
provided under the Plan, and (ii)&nbsp;the Participant or Beneficiary retains
counsel in connection with such litigation or legal action, then, if the final
decision of a court of competent jurisdiction determines that the Participant
or Beneficiary has prevailed with respect to all or part of such litigation or
legal action the Company and such Employer (who shall be jointly and severally
liable) shall be required to pay the reasonable attorneys fees and expenses of
the Participant or Beneficiary in connection with the initiation or defense of
such litigation or legal action with respect to such matters, whether by or
against the Committee, the Company, the Employer or any director, officer,
shareholder or other person affiliated with the Company, the Employer or any
successor thereto in any jurisdiction.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17.18</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Distribution in the Event
of Income Inclusion Under Code Section&nbsp;409A</u></b>.&#160; If any portion of a Participant&#146;s Account
Balance under this Plan is required to be included in income by the Participant
prior to receipt due to a failure of this Plan to comply with the requirements
of Code Section&nbsp;409A and related Treasury Regulations, the Committee may
determine that such Participant shall receive a distribution from the Plan in
an amount equal to the lesser of (i)&nbsp;the portion of his or her Account
Balance required to be included in income as a result of the failure of the
Plan to comply with the requirements of Code Section&nbsp;409A and related
Treasury Regulations, or (ii)&nbsp;the unpaid vested Account Balance.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">27</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS
WHEREOF, this Plan document, originally adopted as of October&nbsp;31, 2005, is
hereby amended and restated as of December&nbsp;18, 2008.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit
10.29</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:100.0%;">
  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Guess?,&nbsp;Inc.</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:100.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Supplemental Executive
  Retirement Plan</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:100.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Plan Document</font></i></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Effective January&nbsp;1, 2006<br>
(Amended and Restated<br>
Effective December&nbsp;18, 2008)</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="8",CHK=521710,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KU-01_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">TABLE OF CONTENTS</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:justify;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="80%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:80.04%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.2%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Page</font></b></p>

  </td>
  <td width="83%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.54%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.2%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.7</font></p>

  <td width="83%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.54%;">

 </tr>

  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.3</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Review of a Denied Claim</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">

 </tr>

  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.5%;">

  <td width="80%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:80.02%;">

  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">

  </td>
  <td width="83%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Establishment of the Trust</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.2</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Interrelationship of the Plan and the Trust</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">

  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.9</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Governing Law</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.10</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notice</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.11</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Successors</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.12</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Spouse&#146;s Interest</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.13</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Validity</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">

  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">

  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">

  </td>
 </tr>

  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">

  </td>

  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">

  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Court Order</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17</font></p>
  </td>

  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">

  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">

  </td>

  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">

  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Insurance</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">

  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:11.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.17</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="83%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:83.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Legal Fees To Enforce Rights After Change in Control</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.22%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18</font></p>
  </td>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">iii</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=4,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="8",CHK=314484,FOLIO='iii',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KU-01_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">GUESS?,
INC.</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">SUPPLEMENTAL
EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT PLAN</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">Effective January&nbsp;1, 2006</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(Amended and
Restated Effective December&nbsp;18, 2008)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Purpose</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">The purpose of this Plan is to provide specified
benefits to a select group of management or highly compensated Employees who
contribute materially to the continued growth, development and future business
success of Guess?,&nbsp;Inc., a Delaware corporation, and its subsidiaries, if
any, that sponsor this Plan.&#160; This Plan
shall be unfunded for tax purposes and for purposes of Title I of ERISA.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 1</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Definitions</font></u></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">For purposes hereof, unless otherwise clearly apparent from the context,
the following phrases or terms shall have the following indicated meanings:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Actuarial Equivalent&#148; shall mean a benefit or benefits, or a payment or
payments, which are of equal value to the benefits for which they are to be
substituted.&#160; Equivalence of value is
determined from actuarial calculations based on certain actuarial assumptions as
to mortality and interest, applied with respect to the particular form or forms
of payment under this Plan.&#160; For purposes
of this Plan, the following shall be used in any actuarial calculations: (a)&nbsp;the
1983 GAM rate tables for males and females, and </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">(b)&nbsp;an annual rate equal to 6%.&#160; For purposes of this Plan, the standard form
of benefit shall be a Life Annuity as set forth in Article&nbsp;4.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Average Compensation&#148;
shall mean the highest average of a Participant&#146;s Compensation paid during any
two (2)&nbsp;full calendar years of employment with the Employer (or, if a
Participant has been employed for less than two (2)&nbsp;full calendar years,
the actual number of the Participant&#146;s full calendar years of employment with
the Employer) out of the last three (3)&nbsp;full calendar years of employment
immediately prior to the Participant&#146;s Determination Date.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Beneficiary&#148; or &#147;Beneficiaries&#148; shall mean one or more persons, trusts,
estates or other entities designated in accordance with Article&nbsp;10 that is
entitled to receive benefits under this Plan upon the death of a Participant.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Beneficiary Designation Form&#148; shall mean the form established from time
to time by the Committee that a Participant completes, signs and returns to the
Committee to designate one or more Beneficiaries.</font></h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.5</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Benefit Percentage&#148; shall be used to determine a Participant&#146;s SERP
Benefit and shall be calculated on the basis of the Participant&#146;s Years of
Service as of the Determination Date, in accordance with the following
schedule:</font></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
