  </td>
  <td width="15%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">60.00</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:16.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The maximum Benefit
Percentage used for purposes of determining a Participant&#146;s SERP Benefit shall
be fifty percent (50%); provided, however, that the maximum Benefit Percentage
used for purposes of determining the SERP Benefit for each of Maurice Marciano
and Paul Marciano shall be sixty percent (60%).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.6</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Board&#148; shall mean the board of directors of the Company.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.7</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Change in Control&#148; shall mean the occurrence of a &#147;change in the
ownership&#148; of the Company, a &#147;change in the effective control&#148; of the Company
or a &#147;change in the ownership of a substantial portion of the assets&#148; of the
Company, as determined in accordance with Treasury Regulations Section&nbsp;1.409A-3(i)(5).</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.8</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Change in Control Benefit&#148; shall mean the benefit set forth in Section&nbsp;3.4.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.9</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Claimant&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;9.1.</font></h2>

<h2 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=6,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="8",CHK=988895,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KU-01_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.10</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Code&#148; shall mean the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as it may be amended
from time to time.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.11</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Committee&#148; shall mean the committee described in Article&nbsp;8.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.12</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Company&#148; shall mean Guess?,&nbsp;Inc., a Delaware corporation, and any
successor to all or substantially all of the Company&#146;s assets or business.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.13</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Compensation&#148; shall mean the annual base salary and bonus paid to a
Participant pursuant to the Guess?,&nbsp;Inc. Annual Incentive Bonus Plan
and/or such other bonus or incentive arrangement designated by the Committee,
and such other cash-based compensation specifically designated as Compensation
hereunder by the Committee.&#160; Except for
any such cash-based compensation specifically designated by the Committee as
Compensation, Compensation shall not include commissions, overtime, fringe
benefits, stock options and other equity-based awards, relocation expenses,
non-monetary awards, director fees and other fees, airplane benefits and
automobile and other allowances (whether or not such allowances are included in
the Participant&#146;s gross income).&#160; Annual
base salary and bonus amounts shall be calculated before reduction for
compensation deferred pursuant to all qualified, non-qualified and Code Section&nbsp;125
plans of the Employer; provided, however, that all such amounts will be
included in compensation only to the extent that had there been no such plan,
the amount would have been payable in cash to the Participant in such Plan
Year.&#160; Any annual base salary amounts to
which a Participant is otherwise entitled to receive but which are voluntarily
foregone at the election of the Participant (as agreed to by the Company) shall
be considered Compensation for purposes of this Plan for the calendar year in
which such amounts would have otherwise been paid in accordance with usual
Company practices if not voluntarily foregone.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.14</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Death
Benefit&#148; shall mean the benefits due, if any, to a Participant&#146;s Beneficiary
pursuant to Article&nbsp;3 upon the Participant&#146;s death.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.15</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Determination Date&#148; shall mean, for purposes of calculating the SERP
Benefit, the first to occur of a Participant&#146;s (a)&nbsp;Separation from
Service, (b)&nbsp;death, or (c)&nbsp;Disability, as applicable.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.16</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Disability&#148; or &#147;Disabled&#148; shall mean that a Participant is (a)&nbsp;unable
to engage in any substantial gainful activity by reason of any medically
determinable physical or mental impairment which can be expected to result in
death or can be expected to last for a continuous period of not less than
twelve (12) months, or (b)&nbsp;by reason of any medically determinable
physical or mental impairment which can be expected to result in death or can
be expected to last for a continuous period of not less than twelve (12)
months, receiving income replacement benefits for a period of not less than
three (3)&nbsp;months under an accident or health plan covering employees of
the Participant&#146;s Employer.&#160; For purposes
of this Plan, a Participant shall be deemed Disabled if determined to be
totally disabled by the Social Security Administration.&#160; A Participant shall also be deemed Disabled
if determined to be disabled in accordance with the applicable disability
insurance program of such Participant&#146;s Employer, provided that the definition
of &#147;disability&#148; applied under such disability insurance program complies with
the definition in this Section.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.17</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Disability Benefit&#148; shall mean the benefit set forth in Section&nbsp;3.3.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.18</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Election Form&#148; shall mean the form established from time to time by the
Committee that a Participant completes, signs and returns to the Committee to
make an election under the Plan.</font></h2>

<h2 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.19</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Employee&#148; shall mean a person who is an employee of any Employer.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.20</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Employer(s)&#148; shall be defined as follows:</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">Except as
otherwise provided in part (b)&nbsp;of this Section, the term &#147;Employer&#148; shall
mean the Company and/or any of its subsidiaries (now in existence or hereafter
formed or acquired) that have been selected by the Board to participate in the
Plan and have adopted the Plan as a sponsor; and</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">For the
purpose of determining whether a Participant has experienced a Separation from
Service, the term &#147;Employer&#148; shall mean:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">The entity
for which the Participant performs services and with respect to which the
legally binding right to compensation deferred or contributed under this Plan
arises; and</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">All other
entities with which the entity described above would be aggregated and treated
as a single employer under Code Section&nbsp;414(b)&nbsp;(controlled group of
corporations) and Code Section&nbsp;414(c)&nbsp;(a group of trades or
businesses, whether or not incorporated, under common control), as
applicable.&#160; In order to identify the
group of entities described in the preceding sentence, the Committee shall use
an ownership threshold of 50% as a substitute for the 80% minimum ownership
threshold that appears in, and otherwise must be used when applying, the
applicable provisions of (A)&nbsp;Code Section&nbsp;1563 for determining a
controlled group of corporations under Code Section&nbsp;414(b), and (B)&nbsp;Treasury
Regulations Section&nbsp;1.414(c)-2 for determining the trades or businesses
that are under common control under Code Section&nbsp;414(c).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.21</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;ERISA&#148; shall mean the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as
it may be amended from time to time.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.22</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Estimated Social Security Benefit&#148; means the monthly amount of primary
old age insurance benefits available to a Participant under the provisions of
Title II of the Social Security Act as in effect for the year during which the
Participant Separates from Service on or after attaining age sixty-five,
without regard to any increases in the wage base or benefit levels or any other
change in the law that takes effect thereafter and, if the Participant&#146;s
Determination Date occurs prior to attaining age sixty-five, assuming the
Participant&#146;s salary would have remained constant to age sixty-five.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.23</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Fifteen Year Term Certain Life Annuity&#148; shall mean a benefit that is
payable monthly in the form of an annuity for the life of the Participant or
fifteen (15) years, whichever is longer, and that is equal to the Participant&#146;s
SERP Benefit.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.24</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Joint and 50% Survivor Annuity&#148; shall mean a benefit that is payable
monthly in the form of an annuity for the life of the Participant with a 50%
survivor annuity for the life of such Participant&#146;s Beneficiary, and that is
equal to the Participant&#146;s SERP Benefit.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.25</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Life Annuity&#148; shall mean a benefit that is payable monthly in the form of
an annuity for the life of the Participant and that is equal to the Participant&#146;s
SERP Benefit.</font></h2>

<h2 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=8,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="8",CHK=950469,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KU-01_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.26</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Participant&#148; shall mean any Employee, (i)&nbsp;who is selected to
participate in the Plan, (ii)&nbsp;who completes the applicable enrollment
requirements established by the Committee in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.3,
and (iii)&nbsp;whose Plan Agreement has not terminated.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.27</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Plan&#148; shall mean the Guess?,&nbsp;Inc. Supplemental Executive Retirement
Plan, which shall be evidenced by this instrument and by each Plan Agreement,
as amended from time to time.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.28</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Plan Agreement&#148; shall mean a written agreement in the form prescribed by
or acceptable to the Committee that evidences a Participant&#146;s agreement to the
terms of the Plan and which may establish additional terms or conditions of
Plan participation for a Participant.&#160;
Unless otherwise determined by the Committee, the most recent Plan
Agreement accepted with respect to a Participant shall supersede any prior Plan
Agreements for such Participant.&#160; Plan
Agreements may vary among Participants and may provide additional benefits not
set forth in the Plan or limit the benefits otherwise provided under the Plan;
provided, however, that any such additional benefits or benefit limitations
must be agreed upon by both the Employer and the Participant.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.29</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Plan Year&#148; shall mean a period beginning on January&nbsp;1 of each
calendar year and continuing through December&nbsp;31 of such calendar year.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.30</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Retirement&#148; or &#147;Retires&#148; shall mean a Participant&#146;s Separation from
Service on or after the date on which the Participant has attained age
sixty-five (65).</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.31</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Retirement
Benefit&#148; shall mean the benefit set forth in Section&nbsp;3.1.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.32</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Separation from Service&#148; shall
mean a termination of services provided by a Participant to his or her
Employer, whether voluntarily or involuntarily, other than by reason of death
or Disability, as determined by
the Committee in accordance with
Treasury Regulation Section&nbsp;1.409A-1(h)&nbsp;and consistent with the rules&nbsp;set
forth below.&#160; In determining whether a Participant
has experienced a Separation from Service, the following provisions shall apply:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">For a
Participant who provides services to an Employer as an Employee, except as
otherwise provided in part (c)&nbsp;of this Section, a Separation from Service
shall occur when such Participant has experienced a termination of employment
with such Employer.&#160; For this purpose, a
Participant terminates employment when the facts and circumstances indicate
that the Participant and his or her Employer reasonably anticipate that no
further services will be performed for the Employer after a certain date, or
that the level of bona fide services the Participant will perform for the
Employer after such date (whether as an Employee or as an independent
contractor) will permanently decrease to no more than 20% of the average level
of bona fide services performed by such Participant (whether as an Employee or
an independent contractor) over the immediately preceding 36-month period (or
the full period of services to the Employer if the Participant has been providing
services to the Employer less than 36 months).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">If a
Participant is on military leave, sick leave, or other bona fide leave of
absence, the employment relationship between the Participant and the Employer
shall be treated as continuing intact for purposes of this Plan, provided that
the period of such leave does not exceed 6 months, or if longer, so long as the
Participant retains a right to reemployment with the Employer under an
applicable statute or by contract.&#160; If
the period of a military leave, sick leave, or other bona fide leave of absence
exceeds 6 months and the Participant does not retain a right to reemployment
under an applicable statute or by contract, the employment relationship shall
be considered to be terminated for purposes of this Plan as of the first day
immediately following the end of such 6-month period.&#160; In applying the provisions of this paragraph,
a leave of absence shall be considered a bona fide leave of absence only if
there is a reasonable expectation that the Participant will return to perform
services for the Employer.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=9,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="8",CHK=309107,FOLIO='5',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KU-01_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:07 2009' -->



<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font face="Times New Roman">For a Participant who provides services to an Employer as both an
Employee and an independent contractor, a Separation from Service generally
shall not occur until the Participant has ceased providing services for such
Employer as both as an Employee and as an independent contractor, as determined
in accordance with the provisions set forth in parts (a)&nbsp;and (b)&nbsp;of
this Section, respectively.&#160; Similarly,
if a Participant either (i)&nbsp;ceases providing services for an Employer as
an independent contractor and begins providing services for such Employer as an
Employee, or (ii)&nbsp;ceases providing services for an Employer as an Employee
and begins providing services for such Employer as an independent contractor,
the Participant will not be considered to have experienced a Separation from
Service until the Participant has ceased providing services for such Employer
in both capacities, as determined in accordance with the applicable provisions
set forth in parts (a)&nbsp;and (b)&nbsp;of this Section.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding the foregoing
provisions in this part (c), if a Participant provides services for an Employer
as both an Employee and as a member of the board of directors of any Employer
(a &#147;Director&#148;), to the extent permitted by Treas. Reg. &#167;1.409A-1(h)(5)&nbsp;the
services provided by such Participant as a Director shall not be taken into
account in determining whether the Participant has experienced a Separation
from Service as an Employee.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.33</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;SERP
Benefit&#148; shall mean a monthly amount, payable to a Participant in the form provided
in Article&nbsp;4 and commencing in accordance with the provisions of Article&nbsp;3.&#160; Notwithstanding the actual commencement date
of the SERP Benefit, the monthly amount shall be fixed and determined and shall
be computed based on the Participant&#146;s Determination Date as follows:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 99.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">the Participant&#146;s Average Compensation, divided by twelve (12);</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 99.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 99.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">the amount determined in (a)&nbsp;above multiplied by the Participant&#146;s
Benefit Percentage;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 99.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 99.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">the amount determined in (b)&nbsp;above <u>less</u> the Participant&#146;s
Estimated Social Security Benefit;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 99.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 99.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">the amount determined in (c)&nbsp;above multiplied by the Participant&#146;s
Vesting Percentage.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 99.0pt;text-align:left;text-indent:-27.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.34</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Ten Year Term Certain Life Annuity&#148; shall mean a benefit that is payable
monthly in the form of an annuity for the life of the Participant or ten (10)&nbsp;years,
whichever is longer, and that is equal to the Participant&#146;s SERP Benefit.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.35</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Termination
Benefit&#148; shall mean the benefit set forth in Section&nbsp;3.2.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=10,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="8",CHK=779191,FOLIO='6',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KU-03_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.36</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Trust&#148;
shall mean one or more trusts established by the Company in accordance with Article&nbsp;11.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.37</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Years
of Plan Participation&#148; shall mean the total number of full Plan Years a
Participant has been a Participant in the Plan prior to the Participant&#146;s
Determination Date<b>.&#160; </b>Any partial year shall not be counted.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.38</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;Years
of Service&#148; shall mean the total number of full years in which a Participant
has been employed by one or more Employers prior to the Participant&#146;s
Determination Date.&#160; For purposes of this
definition, a year of employment shall be a 365 day period (or 366 day period
in the case of a leap year) that, for the first year of employment, commences
on the Employee&#146;s date of hiring and that, for any subsequent year, commences
on an anniversary of that hiring date.&#160;
The Committee shall make a determination as to whether any partial year
of employment shall be counted as a Year of Service.&#160; The maximum number of Years of Service that
may be used for purposes of determining a Participant&#146;s Benefit Percentage
under this Plan shall be twenty (20) years; provided, however, that the maximum
number of Years of Service that may be used for purposes of determining the
Benefit Percentage for each of Maurice Marciano and Paul Marciano under this
Plan shall be twenty four (24) years.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:-.15pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.39</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;letter-spacing:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font style="letter-spacing:0pt;">&#147;Vesting Percentage&#148; shall be used to determine a
Participant&#146;s SERP Benefit.&#160; A
Participant&#146;s Vesting Percentage shall be determined in accordance with the
schedule set forth in his or her Plan Agreement or any other agreement entered
into between the Participant and his or her Employer.&#160; If not addressed in such agreements, a
Participant&#146;s Vesting Percentage shall be based on the Participant&#146;s Years of
Plan Participation as of the Determination Date, in accordance with the
following schedule:</font></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="16%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:16.84%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="46%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:46.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Years&nbsp;of&nbsp;Plan&nbsp;Participation</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.0%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Vesting&nbsp;Percentage</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="17%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:17.0%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="16%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:16.84%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="46%" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:46.66%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1-5</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="17%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:17.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="16%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:16.84%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="46%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:46.66%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="17%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:17.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="16%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:16.84%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="46%" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:46.66%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">40</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="17%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:17.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="16%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:16.84%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="46%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:46.66%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">60</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="17%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:17.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="16%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:16.84%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="46%" valign="top" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:46.66%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">80</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="17%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:17.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="16%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:16.84%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="46%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:46.66%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10 or more</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:15.0%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">100</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="17%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:17.0%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding the
foregoing, upon death, Disability or a Change in Control, the Participant shall
become fully vested and the Vesting Percentage shall be one hundred percent
(100%); provided, however, the vesting schedule described above shall not be
accelerated upon a Change in Control to the extent that the Committee
determines that such acceleration would cause the deduction limitations of Section&nbsp;280G
of the Code to apply (unless such Participant is entitled to a &#147;gross-up&#148;
payment to eliminate the effect of the excise tax under Section&nbsp;4999 of
the Code pursuant to his or her employment agreement or other agreement entered
into between such Participant and the Employer, or any such agreement with the
Participant that provides other express treatment of the Participant&#146;s benefits
with respect to the application of Section&nbsp;280G).&#160; In the event of such a determination, the Participant
may request independent verification of the Committee&#146;s calculations with
respect to the application of Code Section&nbsp;280G.&#160; In such case, the Committee must provide to
the Participant within ninety (90) days of such a request an opinion from a nationally
recognized accounting firm selected by the Participant (the &#147;Accounting Firm&#148;).&#160; The opinion shall state the Accounting Firm&#146;s
opinion that any limitation in the vested percentage hereunder is necessary to
avoid the limits of Section&nbsp;280G and contain supporting calculations.&#160; The cost of such opinion shall be paid for by
the Company.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=11,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="8",CHK=677342,FOLIO='7',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KU-03_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 2</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Eligibility</font></u></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Selection
by Committee</u></b>.&#160;
Participation in the Plan shall be limited to a select group of management
and highly compensated Employees of an Employer, as determined by the Committee
in its sole discretion.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Enrollment
Requirements</u></b>.&#160; As a
condition to participation, a Participant shall complete, execute and return to
the Committee a Plan Agreement and a Beneficiary Designation Form, all within
the time period specified by the Committee.&#160;
In addition, the Committee shall establish from time to time such other
enrollment requirements as it determines in its sole discretion are necessary.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Commencement
of Participation</u></b>.&#160;
Provided that a Participant has met all enrollment requirements set
forth in this Plan and required by the Committee, including returning all
required documents to the Committee within the specified time period, he or she
shall commence participation in the Plan on the date specified by the
Committee.&#160; If a Participant fails to
meet any such requirements within the period required, in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.2,
he shall not be eligible to participate in the Plan until the completion of
those requirements.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 3</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Benefits</font></u></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Retirement
Benefit</u></b>.&#160; Subject to Section&nbsp;3.4,
a Participant who experiences a Separation from Service that qualifies as a
Retirement shall receive, as his Retirement Benefit, a SERP Benefit in the form
set forth in Article&nbsp;4.&#160; Retirement
Benefit payments shall commence within sixty (60) days immediately following the last day of the six-month period
immediately following the date on which the Participant experiences such
Separation from Service.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Termination
Benefit</u></b>.&#160; Subject to Section&nbsp;3.4,
a Participant who experiences a Separation from Service that does not qualify
as a Retirement shall receive as his Termination Benefit, a SERP Benefit in the
form set forth in Article&nbsp;4.&#160;
Termination Benefit payments shall commence within sixty (60) days
immediately following the last day of the six-month period immediately
following the date on which the Participant attains age sixty-five (65).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Disability
Benefit</u></b>.&#160; If a Participant
experiences a Disability during his employment and prior to such Participant&#146;s
attainment of age sixty-five (65), he shall receive, as his Disability Benefit,
a SERP Benefit in the form of a lump sum that is the Actuarial Equivalent of
the Participant&#146;s SERP Benefit had such SERP Benefit been payable in the form
of a Life Annuity commencing at age sixty-five (65).&#160; If a Participant experiences a Disability
during his employment and on or after such Participant&#146;s attainment of age
sixty-five (65), he shall receive, as his Disability Benefit, a SERP Benefit in
the form set forth in Article&nbsp;4.&#160;
Disability Benefit payments shall commence within sixty (60) days
following the date on which the Participant experiences a Disability.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=12,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="8",CHK=1031271,FOLIO='8',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KU-03_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Change in
Control Benefit</u></b>. &#160;If a Participant experiences a
Separation from Service within the twelve-month period immediately following a
Change in Control, the Participant shall receive as his Change in Control
Benefit, a SERP Benefit in the form of a lump sum that is the Actuarial
Equivalent of the Participant&#146;s SERP Benefit had such benefit been payable in
the form set forth in Article&nbsp;4.&#160;
The Change in Control Benefit payment shall be made within sixty (60)
days immediately following the
last day of the six-month period immediately following the date on which the
Participant experiences such
Separation from Service.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.5</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Death
Prior to the Commencement of Benefits</u></b>.<b>&#160;
</b>If a Participant who is entitled to a benefit pursuant
to this Plan should die prior to the date on which his benefit payment is
scheduled to commence, the form in which the Participant elected to receive
such benefit shall determine the amount, if any, payable to such Participant&#146;s
Beneficiary as a Death Benefit.&#160; The
Death Benefit, if any, shall be a SERP Benefit in the form of a lump sum that
is the Actuarial Equivalent of the Participant&#146;s SERP Benefit, with such
Actuarial Equivalent determined as of the day immediately preceding the day of
the Participant&#146;s death.&#160; Payment of the
Death Benefit, if any, will be made to the Beneficiary no later than sixty (60)
days after the date of the Participant&#146;s death.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.6</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Death
After the Commencement of Benefits</u></b>.&#160; If a Participant dies
after his benefits have commenced, the form in which such Participant&#146;s
benefits have been paid shall determine the amount, if any, and the form of the
Death Benefit payable to such Participant&#146;s Beneficiary.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.7</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Limitation
on Benefits</u></b>.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing provisions of
this Article&nbsp;3, in no event shall a Participant or his Beneficiary receive
more than one form of benefit under this Article&nbsp;3.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.8</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Withholding
and Payroll Taxes</u></b>.&#160; The
Employer shall withhold from any and all benefits made under this Article&nbsp;3,
or from cash compensation if withholding is required prior to payment of
benefits, all federal, state, local or foreign income, employment and other
taxes required to be withheld by the Employer in connection with the benefits
hereunder, in amounts to be determined in the sole discretion of the Employer.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 4</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Forms of Benefit
Payment</font></u></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Normal Form&nbsp;of
Benefits</u></b>.&#160; Except as
provided in Article&nbsp;3, a Participant who is entitled to receive a SERP
Benefit pursuant to this Plan shall receive such benefit in the form of a Life
Annuity unless an optional form of benefit payment is elected by a Participant
in accordance with Section&nbsp;4.2.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Optional Form&nbsp;of
Benefits</u></b>.&#160; A Participant
may elect, in connection with his commencement of participation in the Plan, to
receive his SERP Benefit in a form other than a Life Annuity by electing to
receive such benefit in the form of a (i)&nbsp;Ten Year Term Certain Life
Annuity, (ii)&nbsp;Fifteen Year Term Certain Life Annuity, or (iii)&nbsp;Joint
and 50% Survivor Annuity; provided, however, that the Participant&#146;s SERP
Benefit will be increased or decreased, as applicable, to be a benefit that is
the Actuarial Equivalent of a Life Annuity, and which reflects the actual form
of benefit payment elected by the Participant pursuant to this Section&nbsp;4.2.&#160; If a Participant does not make any election
in connection with his commencement of participation in the Plan with respect
to the form of the benefit in accordance with this Section&nbsp;4.2, then such
Participant shall be deemed to have elected to receive such benefit as a Life
Annuity in accordance with Section&nbsp;4.1.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=13,EFW="2191813",CP="GUESS ?, INC.",DN="8",CHK=466900,FOLIO='9',FILE="DISK126:[09ZAB2.09ZAB45002]1450-2-KU-03_ZAB45002.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='Mar 28 14:07 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Changes
to Form&nbsp;of SERP Benefit</u></b>.&#160;
To the extent permitted by Treasury Regulations Section&nbsp;1.409A-2(b)(2)(ii),
a Participant may change the form of his SERP Benefit from one type of life
annuity to another type of life annuity, provided that such annuities are
actuarially equivalent and have the same scheduled date for the first payment.&#160; To
make such a change, the Participant must submit an Election Form&nbsp;electing
such change and the Election Form&nbsp;must be received by the Company
before any annuity payment has been made under the terms of the Plan to that
Participant.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 5</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Forfeiture</font></u></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Forfeiture</u></b>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding
any provision of this Plan to the contrary, the right of a Participant and his
Beneficiaries to be eligible to receive or to continue to receive benefits
hereunder is expressly conditioned upon the Participant not violating any
noncompete provisions contained in the Participant&#146;s Plan Agreement.&#160; If the Committee determines that a
Participant has violated the terms of this Section&nbsp;5.1, the Participant
and his or her Beneficiaries shall forfeit any benefits not yet received under
this Plan and shall be required to repay to the Employer any benefits already
received from the Plan.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 6</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Termination of
Plan Participation, Amendment or Modification of the Plan</font></u></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Termination
of Plan Participation</u></b>.&#160; Although
each Employer anticipates that it will continue the Plan for an indefinite
